Class Weapon

  • java.lang.Object
    • Item
      • Weapon

  • public class Weapon
extends Item
    Class Weapon creates an item weapon with: - a name (3+ characters) - a description (5+ characters) - damage (positive) - accuracy (positive <= 100)
